Server Client You are the %s Device Name Passphrase Sync Progress
Share and sync data over Bluetooth 1. Please enter a passphrase that will be the same on both of your devices. This will verify that both of your devices are from the same team, and are trusted 2. Then choose between the two options bellow. The phone that is connected to the internet through mobile data will be the server, and the other will context to the server. Host Server Connect to Server Passphrase is invalid! Please try again.
Connect to the other device with the information on the server phone. Make sure that the passphrases match. Connect to a device:
Other devices will connect to you with this information: Device Name: %s Passphrase: %s Scouting Devices Connected:
Status: %s Connecting Connected Not Connected Connection Failed Bluetooth Enabled Bluetooth Disabled
> Not Connected Connecting Syncing Finished Failed
